content: SeedlyTV EP02 Miles Credit Card Asked by AnonymousAsked on 09 Apr 2019Is there an optimal way to earn miles and cash back co-exist at the same time in different cards ?Instead of choose between miles and cash back card, Is there a optimal way for a person with monthly spending about $700 to earn miles and cash back co-exist at the same time in different cards ? so that it can a win win strategy for all ?1 answerAnswerBump0

Aaron Wong, Founder at The MilelionLevel 4. ProdigyAnswered on 09 Apr 2019Not on the same card, no. the last cashback/points combination card was the dbs livefresh, and that's since been changed to a pure cashback offering.however you can use sites like shopback and ebates to earn cashback on top of whatever you earn on your miles card.0 comments2
